verses.roman:
"asmin vane vṛkṣāḥ phalanti" yaiche haya
taiche saba ātmārāma kṛṣṇe bhakti karaya

synonyms: asmin vane—in this forest; vṛkṣāḥ phalanti—different varieties of trees bear fruit; yaiche haya—just as in this sentence; taiche—similarly; saba—all; ātmārāma—self-realized souls; kṛṣṇe bhakti karaya—engage themselves in loving devotional service to Lord Kṛṣṇa.
translation: "This ātmārāma verse is like the sentence, 'In this forest many different trees bear fruit.' All ātmārāmas render devotional service to Lord Kṛṣṇa.
